headline: Giverny Capital Asset Management Trimmed Progressive (PGR) on Share Price Appreciation
summary: Giverny Capital Asset Management, LLC, an investment management company, recently published its first-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The portfolio returned -3.39% in the quarter, compared to a -4.27% return for the S&P 500 Total Return Index. For the year ended March 31, 2025, the fund returned 1.75% […]
